title: What's the optimal Laptop GPU to run LoL?
body:
I'm going away for 5 months and i'd like to play some LoL in the night. What's the optimal GPU for laptops to run LoL at low?
PS: I'm asking here because i'll surely forget to check on answers if it was on Yahoo

replies.body: As long as you don't have integrated GPU you're fine. You might not be able to play at highest settings, but you will be just fine. League isn't that hard to run, even on low end laptops, just get one with dedicated GPU and you're good to go.
PS I run it on highest settings on my laptop that has 2GB geforce 920M, and that GPU is nothing special

There's not one specific optimal GPU for League, and "optimal" can change depending on the driver versions that are out. Generally, any modern dedicated Graphics Card can potentially provide a good experience in League. Our [Minimum and Recommend system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/) is a good place to compare what specs you're looking at and what we recommend.

Let me know if you have any questions.
